00020 const int NumSetStats::cfg() const {
00021     return cfg_;

00025     cfg_ = cfg;

00027 
00028 void NumSetStats::init() {
00029     min_ = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
00030     max_ = std::numeric_limits<double>::min();
00031     avg_ = 0.0;
00032     sum_ = 0.0;
00033     abssum_ = 0.0;
00034     stddeviation_ = 0.0;
00035 }
00036 
00037 void NumSetStats::handle(const std::vector<double> & data) {
00038     // reset any previous values
00039     init();
00040 
00041     // parse the array and update the values
00042     int n = data.size();
00043 
00044     for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {
00045         double val = data[i];
00046         // update min_
00047         if (val < min_)
00048             min_ = val;
00049         // update max_
00050         if (val > max_)
00051             max_ = val;
00052         // update sum_
00053         sum_ += val;
00054         // update abssum_
00055         abssum_ += std::abs(val);
00056         // update stddeviation helper-variable
00057         stddeviation_ += (val*val);
00058     }
00059 
00060     // calculate diam
00061     diam_ = max_ - min_;
00062 
00063     // caluclate avg
00064     avg_ = sum_ / n;
00065 
00066     // calculate standard-deviation
00067     stddeviation_ = sqrt(stddeviation_/n - (sum_*sum_)/(n*n));
00068 
00069     // if median should be calculated, then sort vector.
00070     if (cfg_ & MEDIAN) {
00071         std::vector<double> dataCpy = std::vector<double>(data);
00072         std::sort(dataCpy.begin(), dataCpy.end());
00073         median_ = dataCpy[(n-1)/2]; // 1,2=>0 | 3,4=>1 | ...
00074     }
00075 }

00106     return stddeviation_;

00108 
00109 const std::string NumSetStats::to_string() const {
00110     if (cfg_==0)
00111         return "";
00112 
00113     std::ostringstream o;
00114     if (cfg_ & MIN)
00115         o << "min:" << min_ << ", ";
00116     if (cfg_ & MAX)
00117         o << "max:" << max_ << ", ";
00118     if (cfg_ & DIAM)
00119         o << "diam:" << diam_ << ", ";
00120     if (cfg_ & AVG)
00121         o << "avg:" << avg_ << ", ";
00122     if (cfg_ & MEDIAN)
00123         o << "median:" << median_ << ", ";
00124     if (cfg_ & SUM)
00125         o << "sum:" << sum_ << ", ";
00126     if (cfg_ & ABSSUM)
00127         o << "abssum:" << abssum_ << ", ";
00128     if (cfg_ & STDDEVIATION)
00129         o << "stddeviation:" << stddeviation_ << ", ";
00130 
00131     return o.str().substr(0, o.str().size()-2);
00132 }
